Room.Name: Tranquility Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small garden circle at the intersection of Tranquility Way, Wakeforest Drive and Hofton Avenue, near the north border of the city.
Room.LongDescription: Tranquility Circle marks the intersection of three major roads running through Oceancrest. Hofton Avenue runs northwest out of the circle, forming the northern border of the city. Tranquility Way runs east and west through the circle and Wakeforest Drive runs south past the Dragon's Citadel and eventually meets the Oceancrest Circle.
